verses.verse: A Song <WH7892> of degrees <WH4609> for SHlomo <WH8010>. Except the YY <WH3068> build <WH1129> <WH8799> the house <WH1004>, they labour <WH5998> <WH8804> in vain <WH7723> that build <WH1129> <WH8802> it: except the YY <WH3068> keep <WH8104> <WH8799> the city <WH5892>, the watchman <WH8104> <WH8802> waketh <WH8245> <WH8804> but in vain <WH7723>.

It is vain <WH7723> for you to rise up <WH6965> <WH8800> early <WH7925> <WH8688>, to sit up <WH3427> <WH8800> late <WH309> <WH8764>, to eat <WH398> <WH8802> the bread <WH3899> of sorrows <WH6089>: for so he giveth <WH5414> <WH8799> his beloved <WH3039> sleep <WH8142>.
Lo, children <WH1121> are an heritage <WH5159> of the YY <WH3068>: and the fruit <WH6529> of the womb <WH990> is his reward <WH7939>.
As arrows <WH2671> are in the hand <WH3027> of a mighty man <WH1368>; so are children <WH1121> of the youth <WH5271>.

Happy <WH835> is the man <WH1397> that hath his quiver <WH827> full <WH4390> <WH8765> of them: they shall not be ashamed <WH954> <WH8799>, but they shall speak <WH1696> <WH8762> with the enemies <WH341> <WH8802> in the gate <WH8179>.
